overview:
American Dj is a name that reflects the real roots from this professional, natural from Yonkers (New York). Since ever, music has marked his life. In 2000, with only 17 years old, he began his career by the invitation of a club owner to be its resident DJ. In there, he has learned how to mix with another DJ.

2003 was the year when he became the mainer DJ from that club. However, during those 3 years, he has passed by many clubs from the north of Portugal and he has played also in France.

In that same year, he was invited to work with â€œBimotor DJâ€ & â€œTribes & Vibes Recordsâ€, two important music stores. He has been part of two radio programs such as â€œBlindagemâ€ in â€œVagos Fm Radioâ€ and the program â€œ40 Degreesâ€ at â€œRadio Nove3Cincoâ€.

In 2004 he was invited to be part from the dj agencies â€œHand at Workâ€, â€œSlave Recordsâ€ and â€œDisco-pt Managementâ€.

In the end of 2005, he decided to leave the club where he was a resident and accepted the invitation from â€œRadio Nove3Cincoâ€ to be them official DJ. During a year, he participated in the â€œNove3Cincoâ€ official tour where he has played in the most known Portuguese clubs, such as:

â€œHit Clubâ€, â€œVaticano Clubâ€, â€œLagar’sâ€, â€œPark Clubâ€â€¦

And a origin track named “Terror Track” promoted by “BS Recors”.

Every Friday’s he plays on â€œRadio Caminhaâ€ from 1 pm till 2 pm and he is online at www.dreamvison.pt. On Saturday’s he plays in â€œRadio Horizonteâ€ from 1 pm till 2 pm and he is online at www.americandj.podomatic.com.
